body_html:
@helxsz
I think these warning means that it did not work. (These were the warnings that went away after I made the symbolic links). Did you make 6ish links in your /usr/local/cuda-7.5/lib64 folder? For example, what did you name the one for cuRAND? And what did it link to?

body:
@helxsz 
I think these warning means that it did not work.  (These were the warnings that went away after I made the symbolic links).  Did you make 6ish links in your /usr/local/cuda-7.5/lib64 folder?  For example, what did you name the one for cuRAND?  And what did it link to?
